Html: I'm afraid the NAudio ASIO support is very elementary and doesn't work on all devices. It is recommended that you make use of WaveOut, DirectSound or  WASAPI instead

Nope nope nope, of course I know that.

But ASIO have it's own version
http://www.steinberg.net/nc/en/company/developer/sdk_download_portal/asio_sdk.html

(Version ”2.2 – October 2005”)

 

So what is the version of your ASIO? newer ASIO versions are downward compatibility

I recently did a bugfix for NAudio ASIO and used the latest ASIO SDK (2.2) as my reference point. From NAudio we only call ASIO API's that have been around for a long time. I couldn't tell you what exact "version" it is.
